name: @substrate/extension
description: Browser extension to manage substrate-based blockchain light clients
author: Parity Technologies

scripts.build:m3: yarn clean && yarn prep:m3 && concurrently "yarn:build-*" && cd dist && zip -r packed-m3-extension.zip .
scripts.build:m2: yarn clean && yarn prep:m2 && concurrently "yarn:build-*" && cd dist && zip -r packed-m2-extension.zip .
scripts.bundle: yarn run bundle:m3 && yarn run bundle:m2
scripts.bundle:m3: cp tsconfig.json tsconfig_bkp.json && mv tsconfig.ext.json tsconfig.json && yarn run clean && rm -rf node_modules && zip -r substrate-connect_source-code.zip . -x 'node_modules/*' 'dist/*' 'tsconfig_bkp.json' && mv tsconfig_bkp.json tsconfig.json && mv substrate-connect_m3-source-code.zip ../..
scripts.bundle:m2: cp tsconfig.json tsconfig_bkp.json && mv tsconfig.ext.json tsconfig.json && yarn run clean && rm -rf node_modules && zip -r substrate-connect_source-code.zip . -x 'node_modules/*' 'dist/*' 'tsconfig_bkp.json' && mv tsconfig_bkp.json tsconfig.json && mv substrate-connect_m2-source-code.zip ../..
